description.value: This code system contains codes for describing attributes of an electronic health record (EHR) product.

definition.value: A patient portal is a secure online website that gives patients convenient, 24-hour access to personal health information from anywhere with an Internet connection
EHR functionality that enables a user to send messages to, and receive messages from, a patient in a secure manner
EHR functionality that enables patients (and their authorized representatives) to use internet-based technology to view, download, and transmit their health information to a 3rd party.
